markdown.markdown:
For the Fall 2023 Semester, we will meet on Tuesdays 8:00-8:50 am in room 350 Moore.


- Data science
    - Learn R on [Datacamp](https://www.datacamp.com/)
    - Begin by creating or updating your a brief biography for the [Who we are](https://gilmore-lab.github.io/who-we-are.html) page on the lab website.
- Start preparing for presentations in Spring 2024
    - Train on poster template for R [posterdown](https://github.com/brentthorne/posterdown)
    - Submit abstracts for poster presentation:
  - [Undergraduate Research Exhibition](https://urfm.psu.edu/programs/undergraduate-exhibition#paragraphs-id-114)
  - [Psi Chi Research Conference](https://sites.psu.edu/psichi/research-conference-2/)
- Launch new projects
    - PLAY
        - Data collection
        - Locomotion coding
    - Legacy: Visual Acuity
    - ~~Migrate lab site to Quarto~~
- Reinvigorate old projects
    - Databrary tagging
    - Databrary User [Guide](https://databrary.github.io/guide)
    - Testing and documenting [*databraryr* package](https://databrary.github.io/databraryr), and the [Databrary Analytics](https://databrary.github.io/analytics)
    - [Motion meta-analysis](https://github.com/gilmore-lab/motion-metaanalysis)
- Future readings:
  - Yiming's PhD paper and paper reviews

## Fall 2023

### Tuesday, September 26, 2023, 350 Moore

1. Project updates
    - [PLAY](https://play-project.org/) update (Madison, Andrea, Belle, Oriana)
    - [Legacy Project: Visual Acuity](https://gilmore-lab.github.io/visual-acuity/). update (Rick, Brianna, Julia, Nicole, Peter)
    - Databrary [Guide](https://databrary.github.io/guide/) project update (Andrea, Liu)
### Tuesday, September 19, 2023, 350 Moore
2. Looking for:
    - Web site master
    - [`databraryr`](https://databrary.github.io/databraryr) package tester and help with documentation.
    - Sign-up for Hypothes.is
3. Future meetings
    - Readings related to PLAY, visual acuity project, Databrary
        - Peter will look at: Teller, D. Y., McDonald, M. A., Preston, K., Sebris, S. L. & Dobson, V. (1986). Assessment of visual acuity in infants and children: the acuity card procedure. Developmental Medicine and Child Neurology, 28(6), 779–789. As candidate for reading as a group. https://doi.org/10.1111/j.1469-8749.1986.tb03932.x
    - Work sessions on using Quarto and R Studio.
    - Learning Mermaid and Graphviz tools from [Quarto](https://quarto.org/docs/authoring/diagrams.html).

### Tuesday, September 12, 2023, 350 Moore

1. What is [PLAY](https://play-project.org/)? (Madison)
2. Introducing the Legacy Project: Visual Acuity (Rick)

### Tuesday, September 5, 2023, 350 Moore

1. Assigning work teams (Andrea)
2. Watch 

NYU Health Sciences Library. (2013, 13. November). Data Sharing and Management Snafu in 3 Short Acts (Higher Quality). Youtube. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=66oNv_DJuPc

3. Discuss project team assignments (Rick)

### Tuesday, 8/29/2023, 350 Moore

1. Introductions
2. Orientation to Fall 2023 lab priorities (Rick)
    - Play & Learning Across a Year (PLAY) Project, [PLAY site](https://play-project.org), [Parent site](https://anhourinthelife.org), [KoBoToolbox Surveys](https://PLAY-behaviorome.github.io/KoBoToolbox/)
    - Legacy Project, especially [Visual Acuity](https://gilmore-lab.github.io/visual-acuity/)
    - [Databrary](https://databrary.org), especially the [Databrary Guide](https://databrary.github.io/guide), the [*databraryr* package](https://databrary.github.io/databraryr), and the [Databrary Analytics](https://databrary.github.io/analytics).
    - Refreshing internal resources, especially the [lab website](https://gilmore-lab.github.io) and our lab [protocols site](https://gilmore-lab.github.io/protocols).
3. [Onboarding and Training](https://gilmore-lab.github.io/protocols) and orientation (Andrea)
4. Schedule

## Previous meeting notes

[Notes from previous semesters](lab-meetings-previous.html)

## Helpful Links

- Global Protect Instructions for [Mac](https://ithelp.ssri.psu.edu/penn-state-vpn-mac) and [Windows](https://ithelp.ssri.psu.edu/penn-state-vpn)
<!-- - Click to login to our [R Studio Server space](https://rstudio.tlt.psu.edu/s/e40b8122db8f5ab27456f/) -->
- Click to login to [Datacamp](https://www.datacamp.com/)
- How to take screen shots for [Mac](https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT201361) and [Windows](https://www.howtogeek.com/226280/how-to-take-screenshots-in-windows-10/)
- [Databrary](https://www.databrary.org)

For the Fall 2023 Semester, we will meet on Tuesdays 8:00-8:50 am in room 350 Moore.

## Goals

- Data science
    - Learn R on [Datacamp](https://www.datacamp.com/)
    - Begin by creating or updating your a brief biography for the [Who we are](https://gilmore-lab.github.io/who-we-are.html) page on the lab website.
- Start preparing for presentations in Spring 2024

    - Submit abstracts for poster presentation:
  - [Undergraduate Research Exhibition](https://urfm.psu.edu/programs/undergraduate-exhibition#paragraphs-id-114)
  - [Psi Chi Research Conference](https://sites.psu.edu/psichi/research-conference-2/)
- Launch new projects
    - PLAY
        - Data collection
        - Locomotion coding
    - Legacy: Visual Acuity
    - ~~Migrate lab site to Quarto~~
- Reinvigorate old projects

    - Testing and documenting [*databraryr* package](https://databrary.github.io/databraryr), and the [Databrary Analytics](https://databrary.github.io/analytics)
    - [Motion meta-analysis](https://github.com/gilmore-lab/motion-metaanalysis)
- Future readings:
  - Yiming's PhD paper and paper reviews
